overview:
Viral Kadakia is currently Group Product Manager at LinkedIn where he manages products in the Core products group.

Prior to LinkedIn, Viral was CEO of TrustHop, a social marketplace for local services providers - a company he founded in 2010 and which was acquired in 2012.

During his over 15 years of experience in the technology industry, Viral has worked as a general manager, director of product management, product marketing manager and engineer at Yahoo, Zimbra (messaging & collaboration startup funded by Benchmark, Redpoint & Accel and acquired by Yahoo), Openwave (mobile), Sun Microsystems, BEA Systems and SGI (digital media).

Viral earned his MS degree in Computer Engineering from University of Texas at Austin and MBA from Kellogg School of Management.
